service: albert-lambda-service

frameworkVersion: '4.x'

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs18.x
  region: ${env:AWS_REGION}
  environment:
    DB_HOST: ${env:DB_HOST}
    DB_USER: ${env:DB_USER}
    OPENAI_API_KEY: ${env:OPENAI_API_KEY}

functions:
  processAudio:
    handler: functions/processAudio.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: audio/process
          method: post

plugins:
  - serverless-offline
  - serverless-dotenv-plugin
